name: Kyodai Man: Kaiju Fighter
description:
This game was made for Mini-Jam 81: Kaiju!

In a city being ravaged by giant monsters, a lone hero stands against the enormous threat! Enter: Kyodai Man!

The news reports of Kyodai Man and the military's battle against huge kaiju's.

Kyodai Man is a game where you play as a news reporter, bringing the breaking news of the Kaiju threat live. Use your words to determine how the battle goes, but watch out! Kyodai Man only has a set amount of times he can return to battle!

Features:

- Watch the fight unfold against 20 different Kaiju!

- Report the latest news on Kyodai Man and the military!

- Use your Upgrade Points and Heals wisely as you try to last in Turn-Based combat!
